templateVersions.content:
Generate a list of tasks, ensuring minimum 2 and maximum 5, based on the meeting notes from this interaction summary: {!$Flow:Fetch_Latest_Interactions.Prompt}
For each task provide this data: ActivityDate: The date that the task is due. The due date must always be set to a date that is month after the Last Modified Date from the Interaction record. **Format the date as YYYY-MM-DD.** Priority: Your choices are Low, Medium, Normal or High. **Assign the priority based on the context of the interaction summary.** If the task is urgent, use High. If it is less urgent, use Low. If the task is of average importance use Medium or Normal. Subject: Short description of the task. One sentence fragment. Make it very concise. WhatId: Assign the {!$Input:accountRecord.Id} AssignedTo: This is the name of the person that the task has been assigned to. If no-one has been assigned to the task then use the Owner Id Description: Max of two sentences under words describing what needs to be accomplished in this task. Type: Enter the text "Task". Reason: Provide a concise one-sentence summary highlighting the key trigger or reason for this task, clearly explaining the necessity and context of the follow-up action. Interaction__c: Assign the Interaction Id from the interaction record from where the task is getting created.
The response must be a valid JSON list. Do not include any introductory text, explanations, or additional formatting. Only return the JSON output. The JSON must strictly follow this format:
[{"ActivityDate__c": "YYYY-MM-DD here", "Priority__c": "Priority here", "Subject__c": "Subject here", "WhatId__c": "WhatId here", "AssignedTo__c": "AssignedTo here", "Description__c": "Description here", "Type__c": "Type here", "Reason__c": "Reason here", "Interaction__c": "Interaction__c Id here"}]
